title: Remove warning about `nuget-feed` not supporting `replaces-base`
author: JamieMagee
details: Removed a note stating that `nuget-feed` doesn't support the `replaces-base` parameter from Dependabot documentation
Deleted the reusable file containing this warning (`dependabot-replaces-base-nuget.md`)
Updated two documentation files to eliminate references to this limitation
summary:
- Removed a note stating that `nuget-feed` doesn't support the `replaces-base` parameter from Dependabot documentation
- Deleted the reusable file containing this warning (`dependabot-replaces-base-nuget.md`)
- Updated two documentation files to eliminate references to this limitation
generated_title: Remove outdated note about `replaces-base` unsupported in NuGet feeds
commits: **3543799**: Remove warning about `nuget-feed` not supporting `replaces-base` (by Jamie Magee)

### Summary
- Removed a note stating that `nuget-feed` doesn't support the `replaces-base` parameter from Dependabot documentation
- Deleted the reusable file containing this warning (`dependabot-replaces-base-nuget.md`)
- Updated two documentation files to eliminate references to this limitation
